title: Deri Protocol x NULS trading Competition
title-three: Time: From September 14 10:00 AM UTC to September 20 10:00 AM UTC
less-nuls: Less NULS than the minimum requirement
use-a-new-address: Use a new address to participate, thanks!
rules-one: The first 500 new users during the competition period with more than 100 NULS in the wallet address will be eligible to claim a pool of $1,000 in NULS Ptoken
rules-two: The top 10 liquidity providers will share a pool of $2,000 in NULS and DERI
rules-three: The top 10 users ranked by trading volume across eligible NULS - margined perpetual contracts will share a pool of $2,000 in NULS and DERI
step-one: Step 1: Click the “REGISTER” button to register
step-two: Step 2: Click the “CLAIM” button to get the Deri Position token. Please be aware only the first 500 new address with more than 100 NULS can claim the position token
step-two-text: Sample of the position token includes xxx NULS tokens as initial margin, one BTCUSD perpetual contract, one ETHUSD perpetual contract and one NULSUSD perpetual contract
step-three: Step 3: Start trade on Deri Protocol now. Please refer to the guide
notes-one: Rewards will be distributed within 1weeks after the competition ends
notes-two: Trading volume counts both buys and sells, excluding any wash trades
notes-three: Deri Protocol and NULS reserves the right to disqualify trades that are deemed to be wash trades, as well as trades that display attributes of self-dealing or market manipulation
notes-four: Deri Protocol and NULS reserves the right to cancel or amend any Activity or Activity Rules at our sole discretion
in-celebration-of-the: In celebration of the NULS perpetual pool in the Open Zone, Deri Protocol and NULS roll out this promotional event with total rewards worth $5,000 in DERI and NULS
